keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmap <<
unmap >>
unmap <a-f>
unmap <a-m>
unmap <a-p>
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap p
unmap P
unmap x
unmap X
map = firstTab
map $ lastTab
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map < scrollToLeft
map > scrollToRight
map <c-space> visitPreviousTab
map a Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map c LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map C LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map D scrollFullPageDown
map gg scrollToTop
map gj nextTab
map gJ moveTabRight
map gk previousTab
map gK moveTabLeft
map G scrollToBottom
map H goBack
map J nextTab
map K previousTab
map L goForward
map pm toggleMuteTab
map po openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map pO openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map pp togglePinTab
map P visitPreviousTab
map qh closeTabsOnLeft
map ql closeTabsOnRight
map qo closeOtherTabs
map s passNextKey
map T restoreTab
map U scrollFullPageUp
map w removeTab
map yo duplicateTab
searchEngines:
!br: https://search.brave.com/search?q=%s Brave Search
!ddg: https://www.duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
!g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
!sp: https://www.startpage.com/do/search?q=%s StartPage
am: https://man.archlinux.org/search?q=%s&go=Go Arch Manual Pages
aM: https://man.archlinux.org/?q=%s&lang=en Arch Manual Pages
ap: https://archlinux.org/packages/?q=%s Arch Packages
aur: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/?O=0&K=%s AUR Packages
aw: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s ArchWiki
et: https://www.etymonline.com/search?q=%s Etymonline
gs: https://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%s Google Scholar
gt: https://github.com/search?q=%s&ref=opensearch GitHub
gw: https://wiki.gentoo.org/index.php?search=%s&title=Special%3ASearch&profile=default&fulltext=1 Gentoo Wiki
lg: http://libgen.rs/search.php?req=%s&lg_topic=libgen&open=0&view=simple&res=25&phrase=1&column=def libgen.rs
myt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s&page={startPage?}&utm_source=opensearch YouTube Music
th: https://www.thesaurus.com/browse/%s Thesaurus
wk: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia
wy: https://wiby.me/?q=%s Wiby
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
